facts.description: Your next Double Edge skill used on cooldown will always be successful, regardless of the remaining cooldown. If used on Skritt Scuffle, it instead reduces the chance of obtaining an Unstable Skritt Bomb.

name: Purging Light

description: Steal is replaced with Skritt Swipe, allowing you to pilfer from enemies. Successfully pilfering grants two random artifacts. Only one artifact may be used each time you pilfer, and pilfering overrides any artifacts you already have.
